message: I'll give you a good deal, take it or leave it!
I think this is a fairer split. Let's get this done!

I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share. Let's avoid any further losses.

I'm sticking to my guns.  We both need to agree on a fair split before the money becomes worthless.
